query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS savedViews (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  projectId INT NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  filters JSON NOT NULL,
  isDefault INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  isShared INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (projectId) REFERENCES projects(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX saved_views_user_project_idx (userId, projectId),
  INDEX saved_views_project_shared_idx (projectId, isShared),
  UNIQUE KEY saved_views_name_unique (userId, projectId, name)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user MCXikgkEWzjEGDB.4f9baeb9deaf --database fq5wr6YzXYEsLcWqw7mDwv --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS savedViews (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  projectId INT NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  filters JSON NOT NULL,
  isDefault INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  isShared INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (projectId) REFERENCES projects(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX saved_views_user_project_idx (userId, projectId),
  INDEX saved_views_project_shared_idx (projectId, isShared),
  UNIQUE KEY saved_views_name_unique (userId, projectId, name)
)
